channel.title: WHATWG Streams Workstream-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG Streams Workstream

item.title: [streams] WriteableStream constructor example code TextEncoder error
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WritableStream/WritableStream

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Examples

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

TextEncoder.encode has one parameter but two are used. The second argument should only be present for TextDecoder.decode

What did you expect to see?

const encoded = encoder.encode(message);

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

Spec:
https://encoding.spec.whatwg.org/#ref-for-dom-textencoder-encode%E2%91%A0
Full example (which does not have this issue)
https://github.com/mdn/dom-examples/blob/main/streams/simple-writer/index.html

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/writablestream/writablestream
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WritableStream/WritableStream
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/writablestream/writablestream/index.md
  • Last commit: acfe8c9
  • Document last modified: 2023-07-07T07:19:19.000Z
